page.title: 01Small hamlet of Almeley
page.content: Woonton is a hamlet made up of one public house, a post office and a mission room. Frming dominates the area with seven farms and several small holdings. It is a quiet area apart from the main road which runs from Kington, through Woonton to Hereford. This is why Woonton has a good bus service.The people are mainly from an agricultural background and apart from the farms and agricultural background and part from the farms nd the agricultural engineering garage, there is no employment. It is an unspoilt area, the land is mainly used for grazing animals and growing crops. There is a telephone kiosk and a lamp near the main road. One C of E service is held at the mission room every month.The children go to local primary school. There is no shop and the post office may close in the near future.
